pullRequest.title: ISPN-10135 Performance Regression for HotRod-TX
pullRequest.bodyText:
try to prepare the transaction in the primary owner

https://issues.redhat.com/browse/ISPN-10135

nodes.bodyText:
I'd simplify this to only use the key owner on the first try.
IMO retries should be rare enough that we shouldn't worry about the server we're retrying on being a key owner, and we're going to send the request to an unrelated server anyway if the 2nd modification's key is owned by the failed server.
